actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To provide for the implementation of the President's pay recommendations under section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967, except with respect to Members of Congress.

summary.text: Provides for implementing the President's pay recommendations for executive, legislative, and judicial salaries, except with respect to salaries of Members of Congress.

titles.title: To provide for the implementation of the President's pay recommendations under section 225 of the Federal Salary Act of 1967, except with respect to Members of Congress.
